name: SHOOTY TROOPS - The Endless Arcade Shooter
name_original: SHOOTY TROOPS - The Endless Arcade Shooter
description: SHOOTY TROOPS - The Endless Arcade Shooter™. Pick a character and battle wave after wave of enemies on procedurally created levels. Fight tooth-and-nail through the levels with a simple pistol while keeping an eye for random weapon upgrades. Unlock characters with your earned coins, each unique and some with special weapons and or abilities. Attempt to get to the top of the multi-platform Leaderboards! Challenging yet simplistically addicting! Your fingers will be sure to thank you.
